Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DumbTargetingEnemy, Player, SmartTargettingEnemy, StraightLineEnemy, WallFollowingEnemy

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    File name: Character.java
    Version:
    1.1 Creation Date: 18/11/2019 Last Modification date: 26/11/2019
    Author:
    Gursimran Randhawa, Yassine Abdalass, Millie Quinn
    No copyright.
    Purpose: Holds the behaviours and attributes that characters have.
    Version History 1.0 - structure of the class made 1.1 - changed to implement more methods.

      • Character

        public Character(int x,
                 int y,
                 java.lang.String imageName)
        Constructs a Character at a specific x and y coordinate with a specific image
        Parameters:
        x - The x Coordinate where a character is instantiated
        y - The y Coordinate where a character is instantiated
        imageName - The path that would be used to load the image for a specific Character
